casebody.data:
DWIGHT v. GIBB et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, First Department. June 2, 1911.) Appeal from Special Term, New York County. Action by 'Stanley Dwight, as substituted trustee, against Harrison Jeffray Gibb and others. From an order denying a motion for a commission to take testimony on written interrogatories, defendant Stanley Dwight, individually, appeals. Affirmed.

Argued before INGRAHAM, P. J., and MCLAUGHLIN, SCOTT, MILDER, and DOWLING, JJ.

Chester A. Jayne, for appellant. John A. Garver, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements, on the authority of Dwight v. Gibb, 129 N. Y. Supp. 961, decided herewith.

SCOTT and MILLER, JJ., dissent
